BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun prodigy
BackstoryDef.description: Raised in the high-tech halls of the Cybersun Industries, this person learned to build, repair, and innovate with machines from a young age. Their life revolved around cybernetics, AI, and relentless research.

BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun engineer
BackstoryDef.description: As a key member of Cybersun Industries, this person specialized in designing and maintaining advanced cybernetic systems. Their expertise in robotics and AI development made them an invaluable asset in the company's relentless pursuit of innovation.

BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun technician
BackstoryDef.description: Trained in the intricate workings of cybernetic implants and AI systems, this person spent their days troubleshooting and optimizing Cybersun's cutting-edge technologies. Their hands-on experience with machines honed their technical skills to perfection.

BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun architect
BackstoryDef.description: With a vision for the future, this person designed the towering structures and intricate systems that defined Cybersun Industries. Their work combined engineering precision with creative problem-solving, pushing the boundaries of what was possible.

BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun child prodigy
BackstoryDef.description: Born into the halls of Cybersun Industries, this child displayed an exceptional aptitude for technology from an early age. They spent their youth tinkering with machines and learning advanced concepts in cybernetics and AI.

BackstoryDef.title: Cybersun tinkerer
BackstoryDef.description: Growing up surrounded by advanced machinery, this child spent their days dismantling and reassembling devices. Their curiosity and hands-on experience gave them a strong foundation in engineering and problem-solving.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex raider commander
BackstoryDef.description: Once a pirate captain, this person was recruited by the Gorlex Marauders to lead small squads of chaos-bringers. Their leadership was less about strategy and more about inspiring fear and loyalty through brute force and intimidation.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex scrapper
BackstoryDef.description: Living off the remains of battles, this person scavenged weapons, armor, and supplies for the Gorlex Marauders. Their knack for finding and repurposing gear made them a valuable asset, even if their methods were crude.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex berserker
BackstoryDef.description: Fueled by rage and a thirst for destruction, this person was the first to charge into battle, wielding melee weapons with reckless abandon. Their chaotic fighting style made them a terror on the battlefield, but a liability in any organized plan.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex saboteur
BackstoryDef.description: Specializing in causing chaos behind enemy lines, this person was adept at planting explosives, disabling machinery, and spreading panic. Their actions often left a trail of destruction that the Gorlex Marauders thrived on.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex new blood trainee
BackstoryDef.description: Recruited into the Gorlex Marauders' "New Bloods Program" at a young age, this child was trained in combat and survival skills. Their childhood was spent learning to fight, shoot, and survive in hostile environments, preparing them for a life of chaos and violence.

BackstoryDef.title: Gorlex new blood scout
BackstoryDef.description: As part of the "New Bloods Program," this child was trained to scout enemy positions and navigate dangerous terrain. Their early years were spent honing their agility, stealth, and situational awareness, making them a valuable asset to the Marauders.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk chef
BackstoryDef.description: Working in the high-speed kitchens of Donk Corporation, this person mastered the art of creating Donkpockets (TM) and similar products. Their days were spent perfecting recipes and ensuring every product met the company's exacting standards.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk logistics manager
BackstoryDef.description: As a logistics manager for Donk Corporation, this person ensured that Donkpockets (TM) and other products were delivered on time. They coordinated fleets of vehicles and optimized supply chains to keep the syndicate's operations running smoothly.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk factory worker
BackstoryDef.description: This person worked on the assembly lines of Donk Corporation, producing Donkpockets (TM) and similar products at an industrial scale. Their repetitive work honed their crafting skills and gave them a deep understanding of production processes.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk distribution specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Tasked with ensuring the efficient delivery of Donk Corporation's products, this person specialized in planning routes and managing inventory. Their work was critical to keeping the syndicate's logistics network operational.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk factory apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: Growing up near a Donk Corporation factory, this child spent their early years helping on the assembly lines. They learned the basics of production and logistics, gaining a strong work ethic and an understanding of industrial processes.

BackstoryDef.title: Donk kitchen helper
BackstoryDef.description: This child grew up assisting in a Donk Corporation test kitchen, helping prepare and package Donkpockets (TM). They developed a knack for cooking and an appreciation for efficiency in food preparation.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle chef
BackstoryDef.description: As a chef for the Waffle Corporation, this person mastered the art of creating the perfect waffle. Their culinary expertise and creativity in the kitchen made them a key contributor to the company's reputation for excellence.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle research and development scientist
BackstoryDef.description: Working in the research and development labs of Waffle Corporation, this person developed new recipes, cooking techniques, and food technologies. Their work pushed the boundaries of culinary science and supported the syndicate's broader goals.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle technician
BackstoryDef.description: This person maintained and optimized the advanced cooking equipment used by Waffle Corporation. Their technical expertise ensured that every waffle was cooked to perfection, and their innovations improved efficiency across the board.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle operations manager
BackstoryDef.description: As an operations manager, this person oversaw the day-to-day activities of Waffle Corporation's facilities. They balanced logistics, staff management, and quality control to ensure smooth operations and satisfied customers.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle kitchen apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: Growing up in the bustling kitchens of Waffle Corporation, this child spent their early years assisting chefs and learning the basics of cooking. Their exposure to culinary techniques and teamwork shaped their passion for food preparation.

BackstoryDef.title: Waffle lab assistant
BackstoryDef.description: This child grew up helping in Waffle Corporation's research and development labs. They spent their days measuring ingredients, running experiments, and learning the science behind perfecting waffles and other culinary innovations.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne field medic
BackstoryDef.description: Trained to provide emergency care in dangerous environments, this person worked as a field medic for Interdyne. While they saved many lives, they also carried out questionable procedures under orders from the syndicate.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne surgeon
BackstoryDef.description: This person worked as a surgeon for Interdyne, performing life-saving operations as well as experimental procedures for the syndicate. Their skill with a scalpel was unmatched, but their ethics were often called into question.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne researcher
BackstoryDef.description: As a researcher for Interdyne, this person developed new medical technologies and treatments. However, their work often involved unethical experiments on unwilling subjects, all in the name of progress.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne organ harvester
BackstoryDef.description: This person worked in the shadows of Interdyne, harvesting organs from both willing and unwilling donors. Their expertise in anatomy and efficiency in extraction made them a valuable, if morally dubious, asset to the syndicate.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne medic apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: Growing up in the shadow of Interdyne's medical facilities, this child was trained in basic first aid and medical procedures. They spent their youth assisting doctors and learning the fundamentals of medicine.

BackstoryDef.title: Interdyne lab assistant
BackstoryDef.description: This child grew up assisting in Interdyne's research labs, learning to handle medical equipment and conduct experiments. Their early exposure to cutting-edge medical science sparked a lifelong interest in research and innovation.
